tuv.seg: NEW YORK, NY, March 17, 2010 — Travelport Limited, the parent company of the Travelport group of companies, today announced its financial results for the fourth quarter and full year ended December 31, 2009.
纽约2010年3月17日-Travelport Limited，作为Travelport相关公司的母公司，宣布了截止12月31日的09年第四季度和全年财务业绩。
Fourth Quarter 2009 Summary: Net Revenue of $533 million and Operating Income of $69 million Generated $48 million in Net Cash Provided by Operating Activities. Adjusted EBITDA of $138 million.
09年第四季度业绩总结：净收入为5.33亿美元，运营利润6900万美元；运营活动产生的净现金流量为4800万美元，调整后的息税前利润为1.38亿美元。
Full Year 2009 Summary: Net Revenue of $2,248 million and Operating Loss of $(499) million Generated $239 million in Net Cash Provided by Operating Activities. Adjusted EBITDA of $632 million.
09年业绩总结：净收入为22.48亿美元，运营亏损4.99亿美元；运营活动产生的净现金流量为2.39亿美元，调整后的息税前利润为6.32亿美元。

Commenting on the full year 2009 results, Travelport CEO and President, Jeff Clarke, stated: “Travelport delivered solid results in 2009 despite the difficult market environment for the travel industry.
Travelport CEO和总裁Jeff Clarke说：“尽管对于旅游业来说，市场环境并不好，但是Travelport依然报告了很好的业绩。
During the downturn, we increased our investment in key innovative products, including the Universal Desktop, and in core search and infrastructure capabilities.
在经济下滑期间，我们增加了在创新产品方面的投资，包括Universal Desktop以及在核心的搜索和基础设施方面。
We will continue to invest heavily in these strategic areas in 2010.
在2010年我们将在这些战略领域进行持续的投资。
We’re pleased to have seen five consecutive months in travel transaction growth across our business from October 2009.
我们很高兴看到从2009年10月开始，我们的各条业务线取得了连续5个月的增长。
Based on the market recovery and our scalable business model, we expect to grow revenues and profits for the full year 2010.”
基于市场的复苏以及我们规模化的商业模式，我们期望2010年的收入和利润都将保持增长。”

Travelport Consolidated Q4 2009: Travelport generated Net Revenue of $533 million and Operating Income of $69 million for the fourth quarter of 2009, representing a 2% and 44% increase, respectively, compared to the same period last year. Travelport achieved Adjusted EBITDA of $138 million for the three months ended December 31, 2009, representing a decrease of (7)% compared to the same period last year.
Travelport的09年第四季度业绩：Travelport的净收入和运营利润分别为5.33亿美元和6900万美元，同比分别增长了2%和44%；调整后的息税前利润为1.38亿美元，同比下降了7%；

Travelport generated net cash provided by operating activies of $48 million in the fourth quarter of 2009, representing an increase of $64 million compared to the same period last year. FY 2009: For the full year 2009, Travelport generated Net Revenue of $2,248 million, representing an (11)% decrease as compared to 2008.
运营活动产生的净现金流量为4800万美元，同比增加了6400万美元。 Travelport的09年业绩：净收入为22.48亿美元，同比下降了11%；
For the full year, Travelport incurred an Operating Loss of $(499) million, including a one-time, non-cash impairment charge of $833 million.
运营亏损为4.99亿美元美元；

Travelport achieved Adjusted EBITDA of $632 million for the year ended December 31, 2009, representing a decrease of (12)% as compared to the prior year. Travelport generated net cash provided by operating activities of $239 million in 2009, representing an increase of $115 million compared to 2008.
调整后的息税前利润为6.32亿美元，同比下降了12%；运营活动产生的净现金流量为2.39亿美元，同比增加了1.15亿美元。

Q4 2009: Net Revenue and Segment EBITDA for the GDS business were $467 million and $127 million, respectively, for the fourth quarter of 2009, representing a 2% increase in each compared to the fourth quarter of 2008.
GDS业务的09年第四季度业绩：GDS业务的净收入和息税前利润分别为4.67亿美元和1.27亿美元，分别同比增长了2%；
Segment Adjusted EBITDA for the GDS business was $133 million for the fourth quarter of 2009, a (2)% reduction as compared to the fourth quarter of 2008.
调整后的息税前利润为1.33亿美元，同比下降了2%；
Increased Net Revenue resulted from a 5% increase in segments and a (3)% decrease in average revenue per segment as compared to the fourth quarter of 2008.
净收入的增加主要是由于航段数增长了5%以及每航段收入下降了3%所影响；
GDS direct costs, comprising agency commissions, increased $17 million, or 10%, as a result of the increase in segments and an increase in the average rate of agency commissions.
GDS业务的直接成本，包括支付给旅行社的佣金，增长了1700万美元。
Operating expenses for GDS, excluding agency commissions, decreased by $(3) million, or (2)%, compared to the fourth quarter of 2008.
如果扣除支付给旅行社的佣金，GDS的运营成本下降了300万美元，同比下降了2%。

FY 2009: Net Revenue and Segment EBITDA for the GDS business were $1,981 million and $602 million, respectively, for the full year 2009, representing a (9)% decrease and a 2% increase, respectively, compared to 2008. Segment Adjusted EBITDA for the GDS business was $628 million for the year 2009, a (6)% reduction compared to 2008.
GDS业务的09年业绩：净收入和息税前利润分别为19.81亿美元和6.02亿美元，分别同比下降了9%和增长了2%；调整后的息税前利润为6.28亿美元，同比下降了6%；
The reduction in Net Revenue resulted from a (9)% decrease in segments compared to 2008, with average revenue per segment remaining flat.
净收入的下降主要是由于航段数下降了9%所影响；
GDS direct costs, comprising agency commissions, decreased $(77) million, or (9)%, as a result of the reduction in segments.
GDS业务的直接成本，包括支付给旅行社的佣金，下降了7700万美元或9%。
Operating expenses for GDS, excluding agency commissions, decreased by $(72) million, or (11)%, compared to 2008 primarily as a result of the realization of cost savings and synergies.
如果扣除支付给旅行社的佣金，GDS的运营成本下降了7200万美元，同比下降了11%。

Q4 2009: Net Revenue and Segment EBITDA for the GTA business were $66 million and $16 million, respectively, for the fourth quarter of 2009. Segment Adjusted EBITDA for GTA for the fourth quarter of 2009 was $15 million, representing a $(5) million decline compared to the fourth quarter of 2008.
GTA业务的09年第四季度业绩：GTA业务的净收入和息税前利润分别为6600万美元和1600万美元。

Global Total Transaction Value (“TTV”) increased 9% in the quarter primarily due to exchange rates that increased the effective average daily rate. Net Revenue declined (3)% in the quarter due to lower margin on sales.
全球交易额同比增长了9%，净收入下降了3%。
FY 2009: Net Revenue and Segment EBITDA for the GTA business were $267 million and $(776) million, respectively, for the full year 2009.
GTA业务的09年业绩：净收入为2.67亿美元，息税前亏损为7.76亿美元；
Segment Adjusted EBITDA for GTA for the full year of 2009 was $59 million, representing a $(51) million decline compared to 2008.
调整后的息税前利润为5900万美元，同比下降了5100万美元；

Global Total Transaction Value (“TTV”) decreased (16)% in the full year primarily due to a (12)% decrease in room nights and a (4)% decrease in average daily rate. Net Revenue declined (25)% for the year due to the decrease in TTV, lower margins on sales and unfavourable exchange rate movements.
全球交易额同比下降了16%，主要是由于间夜数下降了12%和平均房价下降了4%所影响。
Travelport Limited currently owns approximately 48% of the outstanding equity of Orbitz Worldwide.
Travelport拥有Orbitz 48% 的股份。
During the fourth quarter of 2009, Travelport recorded $9 million in losses from its investment in Orbitz Worldwide.
在09年第四季度，Travelport由于在Orbitz的投资而记录了900万美元的亏损。
On January 26, 2010, Travelport purchased $50 million of newly-issued common shares of Orbitz Worldwide.
在2010年1月26日，Travelport购买了5000万美元的 Orbitz新发行的股票。

After this investment, and a simultaneous agreement between Orbitz Worldwide and PAR Investment Partners to exchange approximately $49.68 million of Orbitz debt for Orbitz common shares, Travelport continues to own approximately 48% of Orbitz Worldwide’s outstanding shares.
同时，Orbitz Worldwide与PAR Investment Partners也签署了一份金额达4968万美元的债转股协议。在此次交易后，Travelport将继续拥有Orbitz Worldwide 约48%的股份。
About Travelport
关于Travelport
Travelport is a broad-based business services company and a leading provider of critical transaction processing solutions to companies operating in the global travel industry.
Travelport 为全球旅游业提供全面的服务及交易处理解决方案。

Travelport is comprised of the global distribution system (GDS) business that includes the Worldspan and Galileo brands; GTA, a leading global, multi-channel provider of hotel and ground services; Airline IT Solutions, which hosts mission critical applications and provides business and data analysis solutions for major airlines.
Travelport的业务包括以下几个方面：GDS业务，包括Galileo和Worldspan品牌；GTA业务，酒店和地面服务的多渠道提供商；航空公司IT解决方案业务，为主要航空公司提供主要应用托管及商业和数据分析解决方案。
With 2009 revenues of $2.2 billion, Travelport operates in 160 countries and has approximately 5,400 employees.
Travelport2009年收入达到22亿美元，在全球160个国家雇佣着5400名员工。
Travelport also owns approximately 48% of Orbitz Worldwide (NYSE: OWW), a leading global online travel company.
同时，Travelport还拥有全球领先的在线旅游公司Orbitz Worldwide 48%的股份。
Travelport is a private company owned by The Blackstone Group, One Equity Partners, Technology Crossover Ventures and Travelport management.
Travelport是一家由纽约的黑石集团、加州Palo Alto的Technology Crossover Ventures以及纽约One Equity Partners拥有的私人企业。
